Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix s60
Reviews.Author: J. McKissock
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera!!! It takes great pictures really quickly. It also turns on/off rapidly. From other reviews I have read, people have said that they have problems with the touch screen. I disagree. My touchscreen is sensitive and in the 2 months that I have had it, I havn't had a single problem. The picture quality is excellent along with the video setting. So far, I havn't had any problems at all. Nikon has made a great camera that anyone can enjoy.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera and it was delivered on time.
Reviews.Author: Greg Brasher
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I purchased it for my wifes birthday. It takes clear pics and is easy to use. we had a couple walking by take a pic of us at night in front with xmas lights and it came out perfect. we blow it up to 12 x 16. This one is a winner. When a pic is difficult to capture go straight to the scene screen and is easy to change to make that perfect pic. we are happy..good luck on your selection.

Reviews.Title: Cool for teens
Reviews.Author: Maureen R. Hanlon
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted this for christmas and she loves it. Not for seriousphotographers but cool for teens and comes in cool colors.

Reviews.Title: The future of all point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Jeff Waggoner "Waggs"
Reviews.Content: Touch screen controls are clear and easy to use. Has the functionality of the iPhone in that the image orients itself to the tilt of the camera. It was a gift for my daughter to replace an aging Canon Powershot. She loves it and it makes a fashion statement because of the availability of the colors.

Reviews.Title: Not for me !!
Reviews.Author: J. D. Cox "Jenn"
Reviews.Content: Within 15 minutes of playing with this camera for the first time, I was ready to send it back. I'm not a professional, but I know a bad picture when I take one. After messing around with ISO settings, white balance, scenes, etc...  the pictures still looked grainy. I primarily take indoor photos and the camera can't cut it.It is kind of cute; it's a bit bulky feeling for a slim digital camera and not heavy enough in my opinion. The pink color is prettier on the computer... lol it's uglier in person. Turns on and off quickly; takes about 3-5 seconds to take a picture.I absolutely HATE the touch screen and I'll never get a touch screen camera again !! The stylus is too tiny for my hands and I'm not crazy about having finger smudges all over the place.I also have sadly realized that buying a camera over the computer unless you are absolutely positive it's the one you want IS A VERY BAD IDEA !!  If you end up not liking the camera and want to send it back, you lose some of your hard earned money because of restocking.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: John A. Carpenter "jadc123"
Reviews.Content: On the plus side the touch screen works well. On the minus side my 5 MP camera takes better quality photos.

Reviews.Title: A must buy item!!!
Reviews.Author: Artsy
Reviews.Content: The camera is so awesome and takes really clear, detailed, color rich pictures!!!I like having a tool to use to touch the screen instead of just my finger (smudges!).

Reviews.Title: nice features
Reviews.Author: M. Franklin
Reviews.Content: i've only had this camera about a month, but i love it. the macro feature and zoom are great for capturing wildlife and far-away stills. all of my friends are impressed with the touchscreen too!

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: Sandra Perea
Reviews.Content: we got this camera for our 12 year old daughter and she LOVES it. her friends are always making cute little videos and trading pictures thru email. it might have been her favorite christmas present this year.

Reviews.Title: Does more than I thought
Reviews.Author: Susan Shave
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my 15 year old daughter and she just loves it. Great for teenagers. Has a lot more features than I thought it did, takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth C. Myers
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent. The battery can be used for three days after it is charged. The pictures are great. I like the scene option because it automatically chooses an appropriate back ground for you.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera.  I wish it were faster on the focus - there is a pretty good delay between pushing the botton and the picture actually taking, which for me is frustrating because I bought it to take photos of puppies - and by the time the camera takes the picture, the puppy has long moved.  Otherwise, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Akin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife because she love to take pictures. She loves that it is pink and loves the case it takes great quality pictures and video. A really nice camera to have.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix by Nikon is the best!
Reviews.Author: Tina M. Hoop "Pa housewife"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera a few years ago and it is still working great and that is after being dropped hundreds of times,also it was left outside over night last fall and it still works just the same as the day i bought it.Can't top it!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S60
Reviews.Author: Leah1456
Reviews.Content: I'm a teenager and my grandma got me this camera last year for Christmas. I have no complaints about it. I love everything about it. It's easy to travel with and it hasn't died on me yet. The picture quality is amazing. I took it to a concert and I was amazed how well most of the pictures turned out. I've taken at least 5000 pictures with it so far. It has slowed down on me a few times and froze up but my brother told me it was because I had too many pictures on it. I deleted some of them and it went back to normal. I highly recommend this camera. :]

Reviews.Title: Not worth your hard earned money!
Reviews.Author: cybermama
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 8 months.  I read the instruction manual and educated myself on this camera before using it.  In the first month of owning it it went in to Nikon to be serviced because the "wonderful" touch screen kept locking up & without the touch screen working properly, you have no camera to use!  Servicing the camera was a pain and Nikon customer service was not very helpful, Nikon had the camera for 2 months out of the 8 months I have owned it.  Once I got it back, it seems the picture quality is even worse than before it went in.  Nikon cannot answer why this is happening.  I have a crappy camera and I'm out a good chunk of money for it :(  I have to be perfectly frank, the picture quality of this Nikon s60 camera sucks.  Pictures are blurred majority of the time, the shutter time is a lot slower than the manufacturer states.  I am so frustrated with this camera and all the problems I have had, so my best advice to you is purchase anything but the Nikon.  Do your home work, read the reviews and make your best decision on what will work best for you.  If you want to deal with blurred pictures consistently, slow shutter time, a touch screen that works when it wants to and poor customer service this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: cool technology
Reviews.Author: D. Littlefield
Reviews.Content: Picture quaility is excellent.  Camera is small and easy to carry and keep with you for unexpected photo opportunities.

Reviews.Title: Just Junk
Reviews.Author: Fiona Shreck
Reviews.Content: After 1 year and 3 months this camea is done. And I find out that the case I paid extra for most likely the cause. Dirt and dust get in and get in tthe lens. then you have lens error. Then you have no more amera

Reviews.Title: Broke After 1 Month
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Romano
Reviews.Content: Nice camera but not very durable. It had to be sent away for repair after 1 month of steady use.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: D. Nappi "Diane"
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy useing this camera. It is very simple to use and takes great pictures. I love the look and design of it and the instructions are simple. I am not the best person at useing technology in any form but I have NO trouble with this at all

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S60 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom (Champagne Pink)
Reviews.Author: A. Sandoval "A.S."
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriend for Christmas, and it has been an embarrassment. The screen only worked for about an hour before it turned green. We are in the process of exchanging it or getting it fixed. There is nothing worse than giving a defective gift. Stay away from Amazon. It is too much trouble to return or get something fixed. Buy your stuff from a store that has lots of warranty for their products and with an easier exchange process. As for the camera, it works great, but the screen is extremely sensitive. If the screen doesn't work, there goes your entire camera. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas, but after reading the reviews we decided to send it back. We never even took it out of the box. It's a neat looking camera but I didn't like the reviews.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
5x optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens; Optical VR Image Stabilization
3.5-inch high-resolution touch-panel LCD; customizable touch-panel display
Auto adjusts up to ISO 3200; Shutter and Blink Warning
Captures images to SD/SDHC cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S60 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom (Champagne Pink)
